actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the San Joaquin del Canon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission, and for other purposes.
short_title: San Joaquin del Canon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission Act

summary.text: San Joaquin del Cannon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission Act - Establishes the San Joaquin del Canon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission to determine the boundaries and interests in land of such Grant in New Mexico. Specified the composition of such Commission. Provides for the appointment of a staff of such Commission. Authorizes such Commission to hold hearings. Requires such Commission to report to the President and Congress within three years with findings and recommendations concerning such Grant.

titles.title: San Joaquin del Canon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission Act
A bill to establish the San Joaquin del Canon del Rio de Chama Grant Commission, and for other purposes.
